scripts.build:release: cargo build --target=wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/browser_echo.wasm --out-dir=public/wasm --weak-refs --target=web && wasm-opt --enable-nontrapping-float-to-int --enable-bulk-memory -Os -o public/wasm/browser_echo_bg.wasm public/wasm/browser_echo_bg.wasm
